name: ictbilling
short_description:
ICTBilling contains a set of Drupal 7 modules that can be used with Ubercart E-commerce solution and ICTBroadcast, a unified communication auto dialer software. 

This Client and Billing solution for ITSP has following modules and rules: client module, ictservice module, ratelist module and rules for ubercart. Client module handles clients user interfaces, subscribed service details, service links, list of available addons and current balance. Another module, ICTService creates simple rules that adds top-up, purchase of add-on, assign/revoke permission, create and assign agent / extensions. ICTService also manages a form that allows new customers to choose a package to subscribe. Ratelist module directly connects with service portal's rate list and imports complete rate list in the Drupal table for rate list.
summary: A client management, billing  and e-commerce solution
